title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Practical Competencies: Intergenerational Communication-Based Language Leadership Development Course

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can identify three or more linguistic barriers in intergenerational communication and explain resolution strategies.
Learners can apply empathic dialogue skills in intergenerational contexts with 80% or higher accuracy through real-world case studies.
Learners can share experiences of performing effective leadership in intergenerational collaborative projects through four weeks of interactive activities.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
